name: Geometric Shapes Motion
description: Rotating geometric object - tests baseline motion quality with simple rotation

sceneContext.summary: A colorful spinning top toy rotating on a wooden surface
sceneContext.environment: Warm wooden table surface with soft natural lighting

startKeyframe.prompt: A colorful spinning top toy on a wooden table, the top is upright and still, bright primary colors red blue yellow, soft natural lighting, shallow depth of field, simple composition, warm wood grain texture, clean background
startKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, noisy, grainy, multiple objects, cluttered, text, watermark, hands, people, complex background, dark shadows

endKeyframe.prompt: A colorful spinning top toy on a wooden table, the top is spinning and slightly tilted, motion blur on the colors, bright primary colors red blue yellow, soft natural lighting, shallow depth of field, simple composition, warm wood grain texture, clean background
endKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, noisy, grainy, multiple objects, cluttered, text, watermark, hands, people, complex background, dark shadows

videoContext.motionDescription: The spinning top begins to spin, rotating smoothly with colors blending into motion blur

expectedBehavior.primary: Top spins with visible rotation motion
expectedBehavior.secondary: Colors blur together as top gains speed
